title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 81.3 - Objections to registration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 81.3 - Objections to registration

State Regulations

Any labor organization or aggrieved person who wishes to
object to the registration of such device shall within 20 days following the
date of the publication of the notice of such application, file such objection
in writing with the Industrial Commissioner, setting forth the reasons for the
objections. Upon receipt of an objection, the Industrial Commissioner shall
immediately refer the objection to the Board of Standards and

Appeals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
81.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
